casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff,
v.
Bienvenido CASILLA, Defendant-Movant. M-490 Sept. Term 2018
M-491 Sept. Term 2018
M-492 Sept. Term 2018
M-493 Sept. Term 2018
M-494 Sept. Term 2018
080538 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 11, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to file a motion for reconsideration as within time (M-490) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motions for relaxation of the Court Rules on filing time (M-491), the miscellaneous motion to permit adversary to answer motion and to submit a reply brief (M-493), for oral argument (M-494) and for reconsideration of the Court's order denying the petition for certification (M-492) are denied.
